name: Egg Roll (Deutan)
description:
Ripoff of legendary Chrome's Dino game, but the dino is still an egg... and you can shoot UFOs with fireballs...

This is my first Godot game ever, BTW... And I hope you enjoy it!

Game Controls: Keyboard Jump[W] or ⬆️ Shoot[Space bar] Touchscreen JumpTap half-left of the screen ShootTap half-right of the screen
